Package gameobjects

Class Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • danogl.GameObject
      • gameobjects.Brick
  • public class Brick
extends danogl.GameObject
    Represents a brick in the game, which can have multiple collision strategies and behaviors. This class extends GameObject and is a key element in brick-breaking games, handling collisions and other game logic.
    Version:
    Java 11
    Author:
    Noam Shabat

    • Constructor Detail

      • Brick

        public Brick​(danogl.util.Vector2 topLeftCorner,
             danogl.util.Vector2 dimensions,
             danogl.gui.rendering.Renderable renderable,
             CollisionStrategy collisionStrategies,
             danogl.util.Counter bricksCounter)
        Constructor for a brick with a single collision strategy.
        Parameters:
        topLeftCorner - The top left corner of the brick.
        dimensions - The dimensions of the brick.
        renderable - The graphical representation of the brick.
        collisionStrategies - The strategy for handling collisions.
        bricksCounter - The counter tracking the number of bricks.

      • Brick

        public Brick​(danogl.util.Vector2 topLeftCorner,
             danogl.util.Vector2 dimensions,
             danogl.gui.rendering.Renderable renderable,
             CollisionStrategy[] collisionStrategies,
             danogl.util.Counter bricksCounter)
        Constructor for a brick with multiple collision strategies.
        Parameters:
        topLeftCorner - The top left corner of the brick.
        dimensions - The dimensions of the brick.
        renderable - The graphical representation of the brick.
        collisionStrategies - An array of strategies for handling collisions.
        bricksCounter - The counter tracking the number of bricks.

    • Method Detail

      • onCollisionEnter

        public void onCollisionEnter​(danogl.GameObject other,
                             danogl.collisions.Collision collision)
        Called when this brick collides with another game object. Executes all collision strategies associated with this brick.
        Overrides:
        onCollisionEnter in class danogl.GameObject
        Parameters:
        other - The other game object involved in the collision.
        collision - Information about the collision.
